author: Jeremy Page, Wenxin Fan
title: Wuhan Death Toll Surges by 50% After China Revision...
description: Wuhan Death Toll Surges by 50% After China Revision... (Third column, 20th story, link ) Related stories: Virus could cause upheaval across Middle East... Albania to impose up to 8 YEAR year jail terms on quarantine breakers... Swiss to fine 'shopping tourist…
content:
WUHAN, ChinaAuthorities in Wuhan, the coronavirus pandemics original center, revised the local death toll upward by 50%, publicly acknowledging for the first time that they had previously omitted many fatalities, including people who died at home.
